item.title: The case for Object Mapping
item.description: Introduction: A Tale of Simplicity VS Complexity NOTE: Every time the word array is used in this article I’m referring to the PHP definition of this term. You can also consider that term equivalent, for the purposes of this article only, to use instances of stdClass or instances of classes that contain dynamic public properties, like Active Record Models. This is because the deficiencies pointed with arrays apply to those constructs as well.
